snippet.title: Hyper DBZ - 1 / 5.0 - Goku Black Trailer
snippet.description:
Goku Black has been revealed for quite some time now, but a proper trailer video for him was never made or uploaded here. So here you go! Black is a charge character with an assist. He's also completely sadistic and brutal! Awesomely voiced by Alpha Proto, while Zamasu is voiced by HDBZ regular ShockDingo.
Background music (SSJR Goku Black theme) by Wizzy Whip It Wonderful: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l7TEOA4BsQY
There's still some work to do before he's ready for a release, so we hope that this trailer can hold you over until then. Keep an eye out for more character trailers coming your way!
